patients' first and last record date.

patientRecordDate.Rd

patients' first and last record date.

patientRecordDate(DxDataFile, idColName, icdColName, dateColName)

Arguments

DxDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "MemberID", "ICD", "Date"
idColName

A column for MemberID of DxDataFile
icdColName

A column for ICD of DxDataFile
dateColName

A column for Date of DxDataFile

Examples

head(sampleDxFile)
#>     ID  ICD       Date
#> 1:  A2 Z992 2020-05-22
#> 2:  A5 Z992 2020-01-24
#> 3:  A8 Z992 2015-10-27
#> 4: A13 Z992 2020-04-26
#> 5: A13 Z992 2025-02-02
#> 6: A15 Z992 2023-05-12
patientRecordDate(sampleDxFile, ID, ICD, Date)
#>      ID firstRecordDate endRecordDate
#>  1:  D6      2005-10-09    2025-01-05
#>  2: A12      2006-01-12    2022-06-12
#>  3:  D1      2006-02-12    2024-04-04
#>  4: A13      2006-04-29    2025-02-02
#>  5:  A9      2006-06-30    2023-12-10
#>  6:  D2      2006-09-01    2025-08-11
#>  7:  A4      2006-10-20    2024-12-11
#>  8: A14      2006-11-28    2023-07-05
#>  9:  A1      2006-11-29    2014-09-24
#> 10:  D8      2007-01-30    2025-09-10
#> 11:  A7      2007-02-01    2024-01-19
#> 12: A17      2007-02-19    2014-07-03
#> 13: A18      2007-04-05    2014-03-04
#> 14: A16      2007-04-15    2025-05-13
#> 15:  D7      2007-05-22    2021-12-03
#> 16: A15      2007-05-25    2023-05-12
#> 17:  D4      2007-09-23    2022-04-04
#> 18:  A6      2007-10-01    2022-06-11
#> 19: A10      2007-11-04    2023-03-11
#> 20:  B4      2007-11-19    2025-07-21
#> 21:  A8      2007-11-22    2016-05-12
#> 22: A11      2008-03-09    2019-11-17
#> 23:  A3      2008-07-08    2018-10-03
#> 24:  A0      2009-07-25    2023-08-12
#> 25:  A5      2009-09-10    2020-01-24
#> 26:  C2      2009-12-16    2025-09-17
#> 27:  C1      2010-12-03    2025-02-20
#> 28:  A2      2011-09-20    2020-05-22
#> 29:  B3      2012-12-24    2025-05-25
#> 30:  D3      2013-03-14    2024-01-27
#> 31:  D5      2013-07-16    2023-07-28
#> 32:  C3      2014-03-26    2024-02-07
#> 33:  B1      2014-06-30    2024-03-04
#> 34:  C4      2015-11-23    2025-09-05
#> 35:  C0      2015-12-05    2025-02-21
#> 36:  B0      2015-12-26    2024-02-12
#> 37:  B2      2016-03-20    2024-09-20
#> 38:  D0      2017-01-29    2025-04-08
#>      ID firstRecordDate endRecordDate
